content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status NO_FUEL with warning “out of fuel” and furnace_source containing 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status NO_INGREDIENTS with 2 units of coal and furnace_result holding 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab with lab_input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, research set to automation, status NO_POWER and electrical_id updated to 10408.
- ElectricityGroup with id=10408 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) and (8.5, 6.5) with voltage=0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(2.5, 21.5) with connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5); status NOT_CONNECTED with warnings “not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”.
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with NO_FUEL status and warning “out of fuel”; fuel inventory empty; fluid_box holding ~200 units of water at 15°; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); fluid_system updated to [38636] and steam_output_point at (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with a fluid_box holding ~100 units of water at 15° and fluid_system updated to [38636].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=38636 at position(-6.5, 20.5) – status WORKING.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=38637 at position(-2.5, 20.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=38638 at position(-0.5, 21.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=38643 at position(-3.5, 23.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=38642 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=38647 at position(3.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=38646 at position(2.5, 24.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=38649 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status EMPTY.
Note: Repeated pipeline connection attempts using various fluid_system IDs (e.g., 38593, 38550, etc.) were aborted as no matching working PipeGroup was found.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Repeated Pipeline Connection Failures:
  - Multiple attempts to connect the pipeline using differing fluid_system identifiers (38292, 38335, 38378, 38421, 38464, 38507, 38550, 38593) resulted in “No working PipeGroup found” errors.
  - Tip: Dynamically verify the active PipeGroup’s fluid_system ID and status before attempting a connection, rather than relying on outdated identifiers.
  
• Outdated Fluid System Identifier Usage:
  - Utilizing stale or mismatched fluid_system IDs prevents successful pipeline connections.
  - Tip: Always retrieve and reference the current, working fluid_system ID from the boiler or pipeline network status.
  
• Fuel Supply Oversight:
  - The boiler remains in a NO_FUEL state, hindering proper pipeline operation.
  - Tip: Ensure the boiler’s fuel inventory is replenished prior to initiating pipeline connection attempts.
  
• Rigid Pipeline Readiness Checks:
  - Fixed delay or static assumptions about pipeline readiness have led to persistently failed connection attempts.
  - Tip: Adopt dynamic connectivity checks to confirm that the PipeGroup is fully operational before proceeding with pipeline connections.
